hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever has land, let him cultivate it (himself) or let him give it to his brother (for free, to cultivate it), and if he does not want to do that, let him keep his land.”

chapter.eng-name: Lending Land In Return For One Third Or One Quarter (Of The Crop)
